title: A Royal Pain
description: Being a princess is tough--but someone's got to do it!Abby Adams of Kansas was born in a tiny European country, where she and another baby got accidentally switched. Now that the mix-up has been discovered, she's on her way back to Saxony Coburn to begin life as the real Princess Florinda XIV.Being a princess is weird but fun--until Abby finds out she must marry the creepy Prince Casimir on her upcoming sixteenth birthday. Or else!The Princess Abby Adams Florinda XIV is going to have to take drastic measures--and maybe even become a commoner again!
author: Ellen Conford
